channel.title: C# on My blog
channel.description: Recent content in C# on My blog

item.title: C# Class Members
item.description: This post will quickly go through three main class members including property, method and event.

item.title: C# Class and Namespace
item.description: This post is the beginning of my journey for learning C#. I will start with the very first program ‘Hello World’ to illustrate the concepts of class and namespace. And then, I will briefly talk about the reference of class libraries which consists of DDL and project reference. In the end, I will clarify the definition of a good program which should have high cohesion and low coupling.
